abstract: The Knight Capital Group has secured a deal on Sunday to secure a financial lifeline from an investor group that included TD Ameritrade and the Blackstone Group, capping its efforts to stay alive, a person with direct knowledge of the matter told DealBook.

headline.main: Knight Capital Reaches Rescue Deal With Investor Group
headline.print_headline: Knight Capital Reaches Rescue Deal With Investor Group

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced and Nathaniel Popper
